m_szDocTitle: A Day In The Life Of A Model 3 Birth | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: A Day In The Life Of A Model 3 Birth March 31st, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   I rolled into Los Angeles at 1:00am on March 31, catching sleep on the flights from Frankfurt to DC and DC to LA in order to be rested for an early arrival at a Tesla store in time to put down an early Tesla Model 3 reservation (or 4). Meeting Kyle Field at the Santa Monica Tesla store at about 6:30am, we found ourselves in a decent spot in the line. We were able to put down reservations for 2 cars each, which seemed to be numbers 41, 42, 43, and 44 at this location. A cool surprise walking up was immediately spotting Pa
